ISSUE.TITLE: CI: line is too line
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hi, while I am reading the code, I found that some lines are too long (More than eighty characters). As the [CODE_STYLE.md](https://github.com/apache/apisix/blob/master/CODE_STYLE.md#maximum-length-per-line) said. > Each line cannot exceed 80 characters. If it exceeds, you need to wrap and align: I recommend adding `--max-line-length 80` into luacheck, and fix all the lines exceed 80 characters.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: chore: update CODE_STYLE to catch up with the reality Currently we already have the line length style check in lj-releng. The length we chose is 100. Close #2569.
